import React from 'react'; import Contact from '../../components/pages/Contact/Contact'; import './navbar.scss'; import { Sling as Hamburger } from 'hamburger-react' import Logo from './Logo'; import HideLogo from './HideLogo'; const activeColors = ['antiquewhite', '#7cd3c7', '#DFE0DF']; export default function Navbar(props) { const [path, setPath] = React.useState('') const [showContactModel, setShowContactModel] = React.useState(false) const [isOpen, setOpen] = React.useState(false) React.useEffect(()=>{ console.log('navbar') },[]) const slickGoTo = (value) => { if (props.getSlider()){ props.getSlider().slickGoTo(value) setOpen(false) } } return ( <> { setShowContactModel(false) }} />
slickGoTo(0)} />
About
Work
setShowContactModel(true)} id="nav-contact" className='nav-row2'> Contact

slickGoTo((props.active+1)%3)} style={{'--nextcolor':activeColors[(props.active+1)%3]}}>
*/}

{props.active!==0?slickGoTo(0):setOpen(false)}}/>
props.active !== 1 && slickGoTo(1)} id="nav-about" className={props.active == 1 ? 'nav-active nav-row' : 'nav-row'} > About
props.active !== 2 && slickGoTo(2)} id="nav-project" className={props.active === 2 ? 'nav-active nav-row' : 'nav-row'}> Work
setShowContactModel(true)} id="nav-contact" className='nav-row'> Contact
}

*/} ); }
